name: Uniswap
description: Uniswap V3 is a noncustodial automated market maker implemented for the Ethereum Virtual Machine. It provides increased capital efficiency, fine-tuned control of liquidity provider, and improve accuracy and convenience of its price oracle.

name: Moonwell
description: Moonwell is a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform that offers simple and secure lending services.

name: Beefy Finance
description: The Multichain Yield Optimizer that autocompounds your crypto on BSC, Polygon, Fantom, HECO and Avalanche.

name: Aave
description: Aave is a decentralized finance money market protocol that allows you to lend, borrow, and earn interest on cryptocurrencies.

name: Compound
description: Compound's V3 app is a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform that allows users to lend and borrow cryptocurrencies.

name: Zora
description: Zora is a decentralized platform that allows users to create, buy, and sell NFTs.

name: Opensea
description: OpenSea is a decentralized marketplace for buying, selling, and discovering non-fungible tokens.

name: Aerodrome
description: Decentralized finance (DeFi) platform designed for liquidity provisioning and yield farming.

name: Rango Exchange
description: Rango Exchange a powerful multi-chain aggregator for DEX and bridges, based on reachability and support of top blockchains.

name: ShapeShift
description: ShapeShift is a pioneer in self-custody for digital asset trading. Our open source platform empowers users to safely buy, hold, trade, and invest in a range of digital assets and improves access to open, decentralized financial systems.

name: Jumper
description: A truly multi-chain exchange. Aggregating the best in the business for bridging, swapping, onramping.

name: OpenOcean
description: OpenOcean is a leading DEX Aggregator, a cross-chain swap aggregator, and Web3 middleware developer in the crypto space, offering a suite of tools across 30+ networks and maintains strong connections with 1000+ DeFi projects.

name: Symbiosis
description: Symbiosis is a cross-chain AMM DEX that pools together liquidity from different networks: L1s and L2s, EVM and non-EVM. With Symbiosis, you can easily swap any token and move your assets across different networks.

name: Rubic
description: Rubic aggregates swaps of 15,000+ assets across dozens of blockchains with the best rates, highest liquidity, and transaction speeds - in one click, thanks to the integration of 220+ DEXs and bridges.

name: Plexus
description: PLEXUS is a cross-chain liquidity aggregator that combines DEXs and Bridges on many chains, allowing users to trade all tokens in every chain with one click and one API at the fastest and most optimal price.

name: RocketX
description: RocketX is the most advanced hybrid aggregator that simplifies access to $100B+ liquidity across 300+ DEXs & 6 Top CEXs via a Single UI and API
